mapper.select: select count(*) from ${param1} where ${param2} like concat('%', #{param3}, '%')
select * from product where title like concat('%', #{param2}, '%') order by pseq desc limit #{param1.displayRow} offset #{param1.startNum}
mapper.insert: insert into product(kind, genre, mainyn, bestyn, newyn, useyn, title, content, age, count, year, time, image, savefilename, image2, savefilename2) values (#{kind}, #{genre}, #{mainyn}, #{bestyn}, #{newyn}, #{useyn}, #{title}, #{content},#{age},#{count},#{year},#{time},#{image},#{savefilename},#{image2},#{savefilename2})
mapper.select: select * from notice where title like concat('%', #{param2}, '%') order by noticeyn desc, nseq desc limit #{param1.displayRow} offset #{param1.startNum}
mapper.insert: insert into notice(userid, title, content, noticeyn) values (#{userid}, #{title}, #{content}, #{noticeyn})
